short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for saving and organizing your bookmarks in cloud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you saving and organizing (bookmarking) your browsed web pages in an easily accessible way.

Functionalities:

Saving (bookmarking) browsed page in the cloud
Easy handling large quantities of bookmarks
Fast loading and easy access
Search bookmarks saved in Producework Cloud Bookmarks
Easy (d'n'd) Bookmarks organizing and classification
ProduceWork Cloud Bookmarks view, group by date or by domain
 
Your bookmarks will be saved in the Cloud. Your created bookmarks data is secured and will never be used outside of the ProduceWork Cloud Bookmarks application context.
